mapper.select: SELECT id, name, config, state_class, life_cycle_id, (select copy_state_id from lifecycle_state_to_copy_state where lifecycle_state_id = #{id}) as lifecycle_state_for_copy_id FROM lifecycle_states WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT l.id, l.name, l.config, l.state_class, l.life_cycle_id, (select c.copy_state_id from lifecycle_state_to_copy_state c where c.lifecycle_state_id = l.id) as lifecycle_state_for_copy_id FROM lifecycle_states l WHERE life_cycle_id = #{id}
